job_details.Vacaturetitel: Staff Software Engineer, Backend - ML Platform
job_details.Functieomschrijving: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Michelangelo ML Platform team (ML background is not required).
job_details.full_text:
Staff Software Engineer, Backend - ML Platform

We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Michelangelo ML Platform team (ML background is not required).

profile_classification.rationale: The job title and description are too vague to definitively classify. While it mentions 'ML Platform', it explicitly states 'ML background is not required' and focuses on backend software engineering, which could encompass many areas beyond specialized AI/ML roles.

job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is described as a 'Software Engineer' with a focus on 'Backend' development, indicating traditional software engineering responsibilities.
